main event: Several witnesses in York, Pennsylvania observed a bright moving object forming an arc and described it as cone-shaped with a round base. The object was sighted for 2-3 seconds and traveled at rapid speeds.
interesting points: Multiple witnesses observed the object, adding credibility to the sighting.
The object was described as cone-shaped with a round base, which is atypical for known aircraft or astronomical objects.
The sighting lasted for a very short duration, indicating the speed of the object.
The report mentioned insufficient data for evaluation, suggesting a lack of clear explanation for the sighting.
The comments on the report referred to the sighting as a meteor, highlighting the challenge of identifying unidentified objects.
sighted object: bright moving object forming an arc, cone-shaped with a round base
